n: Drew's World Famous Triple Rush Hot Chocolate
des: "A Triple Rush of all my favorite things in one great winter drink! Serve with marshmallows and a dash of chocolate sprinkles."
ins: Combine the chocolate chips and milk in a glass or plastic dish, and microwave on high, stirring every 20 to 30 seconds, until melted and smooth. Mix in the coffee, cinnamon, and hot chili powder until the instant coffee has dissolved. Stir in the cold milk. Strain into 2 mugs. Thin with additional milk, if desired.
